Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.screens.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LevelCallback, PlayerCallback, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, PlayerCallback, LevelCallback
    This screen holds the main game loop
